name: Boyle and Bubble
description:
The young witch Boyle and her familiar Bubble set out into the woods to stop a powerful magic spell gone awry!

Duck and weave between enemies while catching in your cauldron the elemental attacks flung at you. Mix them up for a powerful spell! But be warned -- when the cauldron is full, Boyle is vulnerable to attack.

Move with W, A, S, and D, or the arrow keys.

Fire with Space, use magic with E.

Created with GameMaker Studio, Aseprite, bfxr, and BeepBox.

Originally created for GBJAM5.

http://twitter.com/hiddenpuncher
